title: AI Performance Improvement Exceeds Moore's Law
description: An interactive chart showing how AI performance on ImageNet classification has improved exponentially from 2010-2023, with a doubling rate that significantly exceeds Moore's Law.
subject: Mathematics
topic: AI Performance Improvement Exceeds Moore's Law
author: Dan McCreary
learningObjectives: Understand the mathematical concept of ai performance improvement exceeds moore's law
Apply ai performance improvement exceeds moore's law to solve problems
Visualize and interpret ai performance improvement exceeds moore's law relationships
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on ai performance improvement exceeds moore's law
